Package client.mvc.controller

Class ControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
client.mvc.controller.ControllerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameControllerImpl, MenuControllerImpl
public class ControllerImpl extends Object implements Controller
The class ControllerImpl implements Controller methods. This allows to do some basic operation common to each View
